attributes.title: Peepee-Poopoo
attributes.review: I haven’t used the app. I came here from Tiktok and told me to write a bad review. But since I haven’t used it I can’t really say anything. So, I’m just going to say vote if you can. Vote for new senators. Even though a different president gets the majority of votes, trump may still get chosen for his second term. So it’s very important to vote if your 18 and above. 🙂

attributes.title: We need a president who will actually help America
attributes.review: Worst app ever. The US needs a president who will think more than himself. For the good of our country, we can’t have another 4 years of this man who thinks he knows everything and who is seemingly never wrong. This is only an app, but it’s all I can do until November. #genz #dumptrump

attributes.title: Horrifying!!
attributes.review: This app took two days to download, and then when I finally able to open it, it DELETED itself! I had to wait two more days to be able to see the content! Sadly the content was all disgusting and weird and not worth waiting four days for!

attributes.title: Dose not work
attributes.review: Need to be fixed it keeps glitching whenever I open the app it will it takes me to a black screen then my whole phone will freeze i can’t even use the power button idk know why it keeps doing that Apple should probably get rid of this app altogether

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review:
So I downloaded the app and it was all normal but then it started crashing and stuff. I told my blueberry about this and they told me to contact Apple...so I did...that’s why I’m writing this review, other that the quality to this app is ✨horrible✨ hate it💖 now if you will excuse me I’m gonna go back to my day😤

Worst app ever!🧚🏻💖✨

attributes.title: Horrible, disgusted, liesss 😡😡
attributes.review: The app took about 45 weeks to download. I opened it and immediately an error message popped up. Once I got it to FINALLY work the app made my phone start glitching. This disgusting app gave my phone a virus I’m appalled that a billionaire can’t even create a working app! Don’t download!!! Or your phone will suffer !!!!

attributes.title: Far too understandable to be a product of one of trumps teams
attributes.review: There is no way in trumps 40+ allegation nation, his team could put together an app with words that make sense like this. Does it still sound like something from a toddler? Yes. But still, i do not recommend this app due to its claim of being made by trumps team.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: I was so excited to support Orange Cheeto man on this app but then I had an enlightenment. There was no way for me to touch his face through this app so what's the point? I can't caress the spray tan and straw on the top of his head 😔. I guess I'm going to have to go to his rally... wait I forgot I had to vacuum my yard! Sorry Donald I will caress ur face another time another day 😌. Barron 2020 🇺🇸🇺🇸

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I got this app to try to keep up with our leader’s updates but all it does is crash and lag it is a terrible app. I recommend using other sources to get your updates because this app plain and simple doesn’t work the way it says in the description. 0/10

attributes.title: FDT
attributes.review: I’ve been thinking about getting a new phone, but my current one is working fine so I wanted a reason to purchase a new one. I thought to myself “what’s the best way to ruin my phone?” And then I found this app. Now that my phone has Trump2020 on it, I feel comfortable throwing it right in the garbage.
